purpose: Facilitates the design, simulation, and auditing of multi-agent systems particularly in blockchain and smart contract domains.
principle: Built using Rust for high performance and reliability, it integrates with Ethereum for smart contract simulation and auditing.
reusability: Modular architecture allows for plug-and-play integration with existing blockchain projects; provides APIs for customization and extension.
limitations: Primarily focused on Ethereum and Rust environments; may require significant adaptation for other blockchain platforms.
name: arbiter
description: Multi-agent framework for design, simulation, and auditing.
highlight: Comprehensive framework for simulating and auditing multi-agent systems with a focus on smart contracts and blockchain environments.
